list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the measurement or extent of something from end to end; the greater of two or the greatest of three dimensions of a body.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it can reach over two feet in length
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nó có thể đạt chiều dài hơn hai feet

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the amount of time occupied by something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: delivery must be within a reasonable length of time
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giao hàng phải nằm trong khoảng thời gian hợp lý

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece or stretch of something.
an extreme to which a course of action is taken.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they go to great lengths to avoid the press
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ đi đến những chiều dài tuyệt vời để tránh báo chí

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in bridge or whist) the number of cards of a suit held in one's hand, especially when five or more.
reaching up to or down to the place specified.
